title: Glass Mask
overview: Natda and Lookkaew, two very different women, got involved with each other because of a car accident. Rachawadee, Lookkaew's mother, had Dr. Goson do plastic surgery on Dada to make her look like Lookkaew. Dada wakes up with a new face, but she has amnesia. And also finds out she has a fiance, Ratt, who is angry that the real Lookkaew had cheated on him. Meanwhile, there are people trying to find out the truth.
